hero.title:
Premium Rice Husk
for Global Markets
hero.subtitle: PT. Princess Jaya Abadi: Trusted partner for sustainable, high-quality rice husk exports from Indonesia.

mission.label: Our Purpose
mission.heading: Supplying Rice Husk to the World
mission.quote: To be the world’s leading exporter of rice husk products—committed to sustainability, customer satisfaction, and empowering local farming communities.
points: Provide consistent, premium rice husk that meets international export standards.
Promote ethical and sustainable sourcing directly from trusted rice mills and farmers.
Ensure efficient and reliable distribution to global partners.
Support local farmers and contribute to rural economic growth.

about.label: Why Choose Us?
about.heading: The Princess Jaya Abadi Advantage
about.description: We specialize in the export of Indonesian rice husk and its derivatives. Our focus on quality, sustainability, and customer satisfaction makes us a trusted supplier in the global market. Each shipment is carefully handled, inspected, and documented to ensure consistent performance and smooth export procedures.

features.title: Sustainable Sourcing
features.description: We collaborate with rice mills and farming communities, ensuring minimal environmental impact while creating added value for local stakeholders.

features.title: Consistent Quality
features.description: Every shipment undergoes strict quality control: regulated moisture, uniform size, low impurities, and full traceability back to origin.

features.title: Eco-Friendly Processing
features.description: Our drying and handling processes follow eco-friendly practices, using renewable energy where possible and recyclable packaging.

features.title: Trusted Export Payment Flow
features.description: We provide secure and transparent payment terms through LC, TT, and Escrow. Certificates and export documents are prepared in advance for buyer confidence.

features.title: Verified and Transparent Dealings
features.description: Each order is backed by lab reports, export documentation, and after-sales support. We maintain open communication to build long-term trust.

product.label: Our Rice Husk Products
product.heading: Rice Husk & Derivatives for Various Applications
product.description: From raw husk to charcoal and ash, our rice husk products are versatile—serving agriculture, construction, energy, and industrial needs worldwide. We ensure stable quality, ready for export in bulk or customized packaging.

items.title: Raw Rice Husk
items.description: Dried and sorted husk, suitable for animal bedding, mulching, soil mix, and as a raw material for industry.

items.title: Rice Husk Charcoal
items.description: Carbonized husk, porous and lightweight—ideal for soil aeration, odor absorption, and eco-friendly agricultural media.

items.title: Rice Husk Ash
items.description: Burned husk with high silica content, used in cement mix, soil stabilization, and industrial applications.

items.title: Mulching Husk
items.description: Selected husk for mulching: retains soil moisture, suppresses weeds, and improves micro-ecosystem health.

quality.label: Our Commitment to Quality
quality.heading: Quality Assured in Every Shipment
quality.intro: At PT. Princess Jaya Abadi, quality is at the core of our operations. From sourcing to final packaging, every step is managed with strict SOPs to ensure consistent, export-ready products.
points: Raw materials sourced from trusted rice mills.
Grading and sizing for uniform applications.
Full documentation and traceability for every batch.
quality.conclusion: Our dedication ensures you receive efficient, reliable, and environmentally responsible rice husk products.

usp.heading: Why Partner with PT. Princess Jaya Abadi?

items.title: Export-Ready Packaging
items.description: Durable PP woven bags and jumbo bags to protect product quality and simplify global transport.

items.title: Strict Sorting
items.description: Every batch is inspected for moisture, impurities, and uniformity—ensuring consistency across shipments.

items.title: Efficient Logistics
items.description: A reliable supply chain ensures on-time delivery to customers around the world.

items.title: Community Empowerment
items.description: We support local farmers and rice mills with fair, sustainable purchasing practices.

exportDestination.title: Global Reach of Our Rice Husk
exportDestination.regions: Asia, Europe, America, Middle East, Australia
exportDestination.paragraph1: From Indonesia to the world, PT. Princess Jaya Abadi exports rice husk products to multiple continents. With Indonesia’s strategic position as a leading rice producer, we guarantee a stable and abundant supply.
exportDestination.paragraph2: Our strong logistics network ensures timely and efficient deliveries across Asia, Europe, America, the Middle East, and Australia.

news.label: Latest Updates
news.heading: News & Insights on the Rice Husk Industry
news.description: Stay updated with global rice husk trends, sustainability efforts, and PT. Princess Jaya Abadi’s latest milestones in product innovation and export achievements.

team.label: Our Dedicated Team
team.heading: The People Behind Our Service
team.description: Meet the experts ensuring every shipment—from sourcing to export—meets international quality standards.

location.label: Find Us Here
location.heading: Head Office & Production Hub
location.description: Our office and production facilities are located in Lampung, Indonesia, close to major rice husk sources—ensuring fresh supply and efficient export preparation.

cta.heading: Ready to Import Premium Rice Husk?
cta.description: Connect with PT. Princess Jaya Abadi today. Whether you need raw husk, charcoal, ash, or mulch—we are ready to support your business with consistent supply and professional export services.

footer.shippingDesc: Orders are prepared and packed for export using durable PP woven or jumbo bags. Standard dispatch within 2–3 weeks after confirmation.
footer.deliveryDesc: Worldwide delivery through trusted freight forwarders. We coordinate sea and land transport for efficient arrival at destination ports.
footer.returnsDesc: Please confirm product specifications before purchase. Due to export nature, returns are limited and subject to prior agreement.
footer.subscribeDesc: Subscribe for updates on rice husk availability, pricing, and export market insights.
footer.headline: Let’s Talk — Chat on WhatsApp
